page.title: 10LEISURE AND ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: A survey of 37 children and 70 adults. {SPORT}All children and 1/3 adults play but less than 1/3 watch any sport live {HOBBIES.}Adults - Creative or Artistic Children - Sport of some kind {TELEVISION.}Majority watch 2-5 hours every day. Favourite programmes are :- Adults - Drama and Comedy Children - Comedy and Soap Opera {CINEMA. }All groups go occasionally {THEATRE. }All groups go very rarely {READING HABITS.}Adults mainly read Magazines and Newspapers,most popular are Daily Mirror and Evening Chronicle.Children read Books and Comics e.g Beano, Dandy and Bunty. {VIDEO. }Over 1/2 have a Video Recorder {COMPUTER.}1/2 own and mainly use a micro-computer for playing games. {HOLIDAYS.}Only 1/2 families will take a holiday in 1985. Favourite is still the Seaside followed by the Country.
